If you are looking for 1 year courses in Pune, Vmaxinfo Instituteoffers various Diploma courses with duration from 3 months to 2 years in IT field. All these are career oriented courses with specialization in IT. If you are looking for 1 year courses in punethen contact Vmaxinfo Institute, Pune, Contact Number 02532582186

1 Year Courses in Pune

Following Diploma Courses available at Vmaxinfo Institute, Pune

  • Web Design and Development
  • Android Apps Development
  • Graphics Design Diploma
  • Software Testing with Manual and Automation Testing
  • Digital Marketing
  • Programming Languages
  • Database Management

Most of these course are available for graduate and undergraduate students. Students from schools or 10+2 can also appear for these courses. After completion of these courses there are lot of opportunities in IT companies and other sector also.

Contact for more information info@itechnasik.com
